item.title: Open Letter to U.S. Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns Regarding Human Rights and Peaceful Protest
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 21:38 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): Open letter to @USAmbChina Dear Ambassador Burns, I recently read your statement on International Human Rights Day 2023 with great interest and appreciation, particularly given my own experiences with human rights violations in China. Having endured what could only be‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/VX9rppPIir — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023

item.title: Open Letter to French Foreign Office Minister Catherine Colonna, French Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary, Consul General Guillaume Roy, forwarded to Ambassador Burns and U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 13:53 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11_1353_0800_open_letter_to_colonna_lortholary_Redacted.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): I am publicly sharing an open letter addressed to French Foreign Affairs Minister Catherine Colonna (@MinColonna), Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary (@BLortholary), and Consul General Guillaume ROY. This letter concerns a deeply serious matter: the possibility of being‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/iuTu24tC1n — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023

item.title: Open Letter to Ms. Desiree Ralls-Morrison, Chief Legal Officer of McDonald's Corporation, and Corporate Secretary
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: : Open Letter to Ms. Desiree Ralls-Morrison Date sent: November 16, 2023, 23:15 (China Standard Time) To: Desiree Ralls-Morrison Dear Ms. Ralls-Morrison, I recently came across a LinkedIn post announcing your upcoming receipt of the CCWC 2024 Diamond Award of Excellence in Las Vegas at the Bellagio, as quoted by Ms. Laurie N. Robinson Haden. While many have extended their congratulations, I find myself in a position of contemplation rather than celebration.

item.title: FBI Assistant Director Donald Alway receives by email a first introduction about the criminal RICO case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: : LeBron James and criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation Date sent: May 31, 2023, 21:42 (Beijing time) To: Donald Alway (Assistant Director in Charge, FBI) Cc: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) My reference for this case: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity Dear Mr. Alway, My name is [REDACTED FOR PRIVACY]. I was born in [REDACTED FOR PRIVACY], on [REDACTED FOR PRIVACY]. I was notified on February 16, 2023, that the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR) granted me anonymity.

item.title: My first communication, via LinkedIn, to Donald Alway, Assistant Director in Charge of the Los Angeles FBI Field Office
item.description: Click this link to see the original LinkedIn post. From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Date sent: May 29, 2023, 08:50 (Beijing time) To: Donald Alway (Assistant Director in Charge, FBI) Dear Mr. Don Alway, thank you for sharing the message of Director Wray. I watched it with genuine interest. I sincerely hope the FBI doesn‚Äôt underestimate the harm done by white-collar criminals. Director Wray omitted to mention financial crime but financial crimes often end up causing very significant harm to society including lots of premature deaths.

item.title: Chris Kempczinski, CEO of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, is asked if Kevin Ozan‚Äôs departure is related to the criminal RICO case targeting them.
item.description: Click this link to see the original LinkedIn post. Dear Mr. Kempczinski, Is Mr. Ozan‚Äôs departure related to the criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and if yes, to which extent is it related? (look at the screenshot üëá to understand) You also mention Mr. Ozan‚Äôs ‚Äúunwavering integrity,‚Äù could you please confirm he reported internally my stern warnings about the crimes McDonald‚Äôs is engaging into? As the CFO, he obviously should have understood McDonald’s Corporation is engaging in money laundering, shouldn’t he?

item.title: Nicolai Tangen and NBIM‚Äôs executives asked who is the anti-money laundering officer at Norges Bank Investment Management
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Date sent: May 2, 2023, 15:29 (Beijing time) Cc: Nicolai Tangen (CEO of NBIM) Cc: Ida Wolden Bache (Governor of Norges Bank), Trond Grande (Deputy CEO of NBIM), Carine Smith Ihenacho (NBIM), Dag Huse (CRO of NBIM) Open letter/communication, submitted via a LinkedIn post, to Nicolai Tangen, CEO of Norges Bank Investment Management corporation, and CC’ed to various executives and the @FBI, in reply to his LinkedIn post whether ‚ÄúCan you spot the dragon?

item.title: LinkedIn post to Nicolai Tangen, Chief Executive Officer at Norges Bank Investment Management
item.description: Visualize the original post directly on LinkedIn by clicking this link. Dear Mr. Nicolai Tangen, This post will be published on McDStockInvestors (.) com which I created for the purpose of listing the notifications I send to investors in an entity you are currently financing through Norges Bank Investment Management. The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) is being actively notified (cc Jarrad Smith Adam Rogalski Mahonri Manjarrez). I also intend to notify Finanstilsynet (FSA Norway) when I have more time.

item.title: Trond Grande and Dag Huse are asked about Carine Smith Ihenacho‚Äôs email address
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Email address of the Chief Compliance Officer Ms. Carine Smith Ihenacho Date sent: April 6, 2023, 23:43 (Beijing time) To: Trond Grande (Deputy CEO of NBIM), Dag Huse (CRO of NBIM) Dear Messrs. Grande and Huse, My name is [REDACTED FOR PRIVACY (note: but I of course gave them my real name)]. I attach a scan of my expired passport and my current Chinese driver‚Äôs license.

item.title: Email sent to MCDC‚Äôs CEO Chris Kempczinski and the Chief Legal Officer and Corporate Secretary Desiree Ralls-Morrison

(Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: I want to notify the Board of Directors of McDonald’s Corporation Date sent: March 16, 2023, 02:43 (Beijing time) To: Chris Kempczinski <Chris.Kempczinski@us.mcd.com>, Desiree Ralls-Morrison, Board of the Directors of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation <bod@us.mcd.com>, Corporate Secretary of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, Global Compliance Office of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation <business.integrity@us.mcd.com> Cc: Many people including the FBI and the State Department, simply open the PDF to see who was notified

item.title: Formal notice sent to Neuberger Berman‚Äôs CEO Mr. George Walker regarding McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-03-16_0042_0800_formal_notice_to_george_walker_neuberger_berman_with_email_Redacted.pdf KEY POINT OF THIS EMAIL: I formally notified Neuberger Berman that ‚ÄúNeuberger Berman has invested in a company which has engaged in a pattern of racketeering activity‚Äù and that therefore ‚ÄúNeuberger Berman is about to commit the crime of money laundering as defined in 18 U.S.C. ¬ß 1957 and the purpose of this communication is to try to alert [them] of what has happened so far in the McDonald‚Äôs RICO case.

item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski and Mahonri Manjarrez regarding the phone call incident to the FBI
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-15_2333_0800_email_to_adam_rogalski_and_mahonri_manjarrez_Redacted.pdf From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: FBI hanging up on me Date sentÔºö2023-02-15 23:33 (Beijing time +0800) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist) Cc: U.S. Ambassador Burns, U.S. Ambassador Bauer, Edward Lehman, David K. Colapinto, Yves Strickler (I will try to update this section soon) BeijingACS@state.gov and ParisExec@state.gov, please forward this email to the Legal Attach√©.

item.title: Phone call to the FBI Victim Services
item.description: On February 15, 2023, I tried to call a phone number I found on an FBI brochure related to the FBI Victim Services. The phone number was (202)-324-3000. But the FBI operator hanged up on me. After the FBI informed me the FBI was recording the phone call, I informed the operator that I was also recording the phone call and he disagreed so he hanged up.

item.title: Email to Mahonri Manjarrez. Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist?
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist? Date sentÔºö2023-01-27 17:32 (Beijing time +0800) To: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist) Cc: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Edward Lehman, and many more people (I will try to update this section soon) My reference for this case: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity Dear Mr. Manjarrez, As a victim of the transnational criminal enterprise orchestrated by the criminal entity McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, I would like to ask you three questions:

item.title: Email to French law professor Yves Strickler
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: : Bonne Ann√©e! Date sent: January 27, 2023, 16:53 (Beijing time) To: Yves Strickler (French law professor) Cc: Many people including the FBI and the State Department, I will update this section later Dear Professor Strickler, Thank you for reminding me to pay close attention to compliance. You are absolutely right! Please don‚Äôt worry if you don‚Äôt immediately have the time to read all of the emails I am CCing to you regarding the pattern of racketeering activity McDonald‚Äôs Corporation has engaged into.

item.title: UPDATING - SEC Office of the Whistleblower, second complaint submitted on November 15, 2022
item.description: THIS IS BEING UPDATED; PLEASE COME BACK AT A LATER TIME (As of 2023-04-15, it’s currently not my priority any longer to finish updating this page. But if you have questions regarding this submission to the SEC, please feel free to contact me at x@ecthrwatch.org). I ADDED THIS ENTRY ON JANUARY 20, 2023. I WILL TRY TO ADD MORE INFORMATION SOON. SOME IMPORTANT NAMES ARE NOT INCLUDED YET IN THE LIST I SUBMITTED TO THE SEC, LIKE WHITE-COLLAR CRIMINAL NAWFAL TRABELSI.

item.title: Request for anonymity - European Court of Human Rights - McDonald‚Äôs RICO case
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original document: request_for_anonymity_2022-11-01_Redacted.pdf This request for anonymity was submitted to the European Court of Human Rights by fax to +33 390214350 on October 31, 2022, at 17:06:23 (GMT), or November 01, 2022, at 01:06 (am) Beijing time. My request for anonymity was approved by the European Court of Human Rights on November 02, 2022. However, I didn’t receive the notification by email they claim to have sent me on that day.

item.title: Request for interim measures - European Court of Human Rights - McDonald‚Äôs RICO case
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: request_for_interim_measures_2022-10-31_Redacted.pdf This request for interim measures was submitted to the European Court of Human Rights by fax to +33 390214350 on October 31, 2022, at 15:09:09 (GMT), or 23:09 Beijing time. Click on this link to visualize the original email: request_for_interim_measures_2022-10-31_Redacted.pdf

item.title: 2-page Statement of Facts in the McDonald‚Äôs RICO/PORA/FCPA case sent to Edward Lehman
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original document: 2-page_statement-of-facts_mcdonalds_rico_pora_fcpa_case_Redacted.pdf Statement of Facts - selected events | Memorandum n¬∞2-2022-10-24_2_pages_only | Date: October 24, 2022 To: Edward LEHMAN (contact email: [REDACTED]) From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) (contact email: [REDACTED] phone +86-[REDACTED]) Subject: RICO, FCPA, pattern of racketeering activity by McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and its subsidiary companies Summary: McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and its subsidiary companies have engaged, for years, in a pattern of racketeering activity, money laundering, and corruption of at least one French official.

item.title: Reply from Constant M√©heut, journalist for The New York Times
item.description: From: Constant M√©heut (NYTimes) Subject: New York Times Date received: 2022-05-31 at 18:24 Beijing time To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Note: the email has been redacted for privacy. Also, READ THIS: https://www.tojournalists.com/open-letters/explanations-sent-to-constant-meheut-may-25-2022/ Dear Mr. X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court), Thank you very much for your emails. To be honest, I have to admit it’s a little bit difficult to follow and I am not sure I understand, yet, the link between everything you told me so far.

item.title: Explanations sent to New York Times journalist Constant M√©heut
item.description: EXCERPT FROM THE EXPLANATIONS I SENT TO NEW YORK TIMES JOURNALIST CONSTANT M√âHEUT, ON MAY 25 2022 BETWEEN APPROXIMATELY 7:36 PM AND 8:05 PM (BEIJING TIME), BY DIRECT MESSAGING VIA TWITTER. SOME OF THE MESSAGES HAVE BEEN REDACTED FOR READABILITY. PLEASE REFER TO THE FRENCH VERSION IF YOU WANT TO READ THE ORIGINAL VERSION. [‚Ä¶] (NOTE: I removed, for brevity, some of the initial messages I sent) There are also other documents that prove that the McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly has a huge effect on sales.

item.title: Email sent on 2022-05-12 to the F.B.I. and CCed to the U.S. Ambassadors to France and to China
item.description:
On 2022-05-12, I sent an email to the F.B.I. and CCed it to Denise BAUER, U.S. Ambassador to France, and Nicholas BURNS, U.S. Ambassador to China.

FROM : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

CC : Denise Bauer (U.S. Ambassador), Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador), [REDACTED: the email was CCed to three additional people]

SUBJECT: I shared a folder with the FBI containing evidence

DATE: 2022-05-12 at 23:20 Beijing time

item.title: Sending the F.B.I. my reference for the case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation for fraud and money laundering + additional warnings
item.description:
On 2022-04-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to give them my reference for the case targeting the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald‚Äôs Corporation for fraud and money laundering.

I am also reminding the F.B.I. that the law firm representing McDonald‚Äôs France was P√©chenard & Associ√©s, a law firm which belongs to and/or used to belong to the parents of the former General Director of the French National Police.

FROM : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department)

SUBJECT: Case number McDonald’s

item.title: Sending the F.B.I. my reference for the case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation for fraud and money laundering + additional warnings
item.description:
On 2022-04-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to give them my reference for the case targeting the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald‚Äôs Corporation for fraud and money laundering.

I am also reminding the F.B.I. that the law firm representing McDonald‚Äôs France was P√©chenard & Associ√©s, a law firm which belongs to and/or used to belong to the parents of the former General Director of the French National Police.

FROM : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

TO : Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

SUBJECT: Case number McDonald’s

item.title: Whistle-blower asking the F.B.I. if they received and kept the emails which were sent in 2015 and if they ever launched a criminal investigation against McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description:
On 2022-04-20, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to ask them if they ever received the emails I sent them back in 2015 regarding the major case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation.

I also ask the F.B.I. if they ever launched a criminal investigation targeting the transnational criminal enterprise.

FROM : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

SUBJECT: Has the FBI ever received the emails I sent in 2015?

item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the serious frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
Key point of this event: the F.B.I. is now formally notified of some of the crimes I am accusing McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and/or its subsidiary companies of.

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Subject:: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds

item.title: Reply from McDonald‚Äôs Global Compliance Office
item.description: From: Global Compliance Office of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation <business.integrity@us.mcd.com> Subject: Re: Have you received my communications? Please acknowledge receipt. Date received: November 19, 2019 at 01:19 (Beijing time) To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) - Our apologies for not responding, however, it appears that we did not receive your communications. Could you provide us with the information that you previously provided? Thanks. Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2019-11-19-reply-from-mcdonalds-global-compliance-office_Redacted.

item.title: Email to McDonald‚Äôs Global Compliance Office
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Have you received my communications? Please acknowledge receipt. Date sent: November 18, 2019, 23:16 (Beijing time) To: Global Compliance Office of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation <business.integrity@us.mcd.com> Dear Sir or Madam, Have you received my communications? I would appreciate if you would confirm the receipt of the emails I‚Äôve sent to you. Have all of the Members of the Board of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation been notified? It‚Äôs important for all of them to be notified of what‚Äôs going on.

To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

item.title: Email to Steve Easterbrook and the Board of Directors of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description: From : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) (info@europe-v-mcdonalds.org) Subject : Phone call about McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly frauds Date sent : May 31, 2019 at 23:36ÔºàBeijing timeÔºâ To : Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Board of the Directors of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation <bod@us.mcd.com> THIS EMAIL IS ALSO ADDRESSED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MCDONALD‚ÄôS CORPORATION. I AM FORMALLY ASKING THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MCDONALD‚ÄôS CORPORATION TO IMMEDIATELY START AN OFFICIAL INQUIRY INTO THE MCDONALD‚ÄôS MONOPOLY FRAUDS WHICH HAVE HAPPENED ACROSS EUROPE AND ACROSS THE WORLD FOR THE LAST FEW YEARS.

item.title: Reply from French Law Professor Yves Strickler
item.description: Note: this email has been redacted for brevity. Check the French version of this page for the full content. Key point: French law professor Yves Strickler didn’t disapprove the possibility for me to do a hunger strike to protest the repeated violations of my fundamental rights by France. For the record, I am now accusing McDonald‚Äôs of having corrupted French officials. It might help to explain why McDonald‚Äôs France and McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, and their accomplices, have never been indicted for serious fraud and money laundering in France.

item.title: Email sent to the Minister of Justice, Nicole Belloubet, to beg her to respond to me.
item.description: Date sent : March 19, 2018, at 22:07 (China Standard Time). Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-03-19-s-il-vous-plait-madame-belloubet.pdf SUBJECT: PLEASE MADAM Dear Minister, I sent you a request last week. I implore you, please give me an answer, even if it’s negative. But please say something. I understand that you must be very busy. You don’t need to respond to me personally. You can delegate this matter to someone else. But please have someone contact me by email quickly.

item.title: Reply from French law professor Yves Strickler
item.description: From: Yves Strickler (French law professor) OBJET: DATE: 2017-07-04 at 01:42 (heure de P√©kin +0800) From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Bonsoir Monsieur, D√©sol√© du temps de r√©ponse, li√© √† une p√©riode charg√©e. Je vous r√©ponds en deux mots car je repars demain. - pour la demande d’aide provisoire envisag√©e, je pense qu’elle est recevable dans son principe ; je vous invite √† lire l’aarticle 20 de a loi n¬∞ 91-647 du 10 juillet 1991 relative √† l’aide juridique (https://www.

item.title: FORMAL NOTICE to McDonald‚Äôs executives, including future CEO Chris Kempczinski, about the illegality of the McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: FORMAL NOTICE : ILLEGAL LOTTERY USA Date sent: February 14, 2017, 23:21 (Beijing time) To: Chris Kempczinski <Chris.Kempczinski@us.mcd.com>, Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com>, Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Deborah Wahl <Deborah.Wahl@us.mcd.com> THIS EMAIL CONTAINS WHAT I BELIEVE TO BE VERY IMPORTANT LEGAL INFORMATION. DON‚ÄôT DISREGARD IT! Dear Sir or Madam, This a formal notice to warn you that your McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States actually qualifies, to the best of my knowledge, as an illegal lottery!

item.title: Notification to McDonald‚Äôs executives Gloria Santona, Steve Easterbrook, and Malcolm Hicks
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) SUBJECT: defamation against my consumer protection websites DATE: December 8, 2016 at 00:05 (Beijing time +0800) TO : Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> I forgot to mention‚Ä¶ As for me, I am going to file a lawsuit against ‚ÄúX‚Äù (but targeting McDonald‚Äôs) for, among other things, defamation. Indeed, it seems some of your executives were behind some defamatory comment against my websites.

item.title: Email to McDonald‚Äôs executives about Allen & Overy
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: : Allen & Overy Date sent: January 4, 2016 at 21:48 (China Standard Time) To: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> Mr. Easterbrook, Ms. Santona, Mr. Hicks, Could you please let me know the name of the lawyer who is representing you at Allen & Overy? I‚Äôve just tried to call them but I can‚Äôt get anyone without the right person‚Äôs name.

item.title: Debbie Schroeder, Investors Relations, McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, is still looking for the information I asked.
item.description: From: Debbie Schroeder <Debbie.Schroeder@us.mcd.com> (Investors Relations, McDonald‚Äôs Corporation) Subject: : disclosure about the illegality of McDonald’s Monopoly in Europe Date sent: December 30, 2015, 22:49 (Beijing time) To: France-v-McDonalds.org <info@france-v-mcdonalds.org> Hi, X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) - Thank you for passing along your questions ‚Äì I am still looking into them and will get back to you as soon as possible. In the meantime, will you please let me know what company/firm you are from as well as a phone number should we have any clarification questions ?

item.title: Transcript of the phone conversation with the FBI‚Äôs Field Office of Chicago
item.description: Transcript of the phone conversation between me and the FBI‚Äôs Field Office of Chicago. I called them on December 23, 2015, at 20:30 (8:30pm) Beijing time.

item.title: F.B.I. Chicago answers the victim asking him to please contact the FBI's Public Access Line
item.description:
On 2015-12-18, I receive an answer from the Intake Unit of the Field Office of the F.B.I. in Chicago.

FROM : Chicago@ic.fbi.gov

TO : [Whistle-blower‚Äôs email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information about me

SUBJECT: RE: McDonald’s massive fraud in Europe

item.title: PLEASE STOP THE FRAUD!
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: please stop the fraud! Date sent: 2015-10-30 at 22:25 (Beijing time +0800) To: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> Dear Mr. Easterbrook, dear Ms. Santona, and dear Mr. Hicks, I repeat again. Please stop the fraud. You must make it stop! I know you know this ‚Äúgame‚Äù is a fraud under European laws. You can not possibly be so stupid not to understand except if you don‚Äôt understand on purpose so that you can later claim plausible deniability.

item.title: Malcolm Hicks, Corporate Vice President of McDonald‚Äôs Europe and General Counsel
item.description:
On October 23, 2015, I receive an email from Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> who is the Corporate Vice President of McDonald‚Äôs Europe.

From: Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com>

Subject: France Monopoly Game Query

Date received: October 23, 2015 at 05:34 +0800 (Beijing time)

To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

item.title: Additional frauds; email sent to McDonald‚Äôs General Counsel CCed to McDonald‚Äôs CEO
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: additional frauds Date sent: 2015-10-22 11:06 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Cc: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com> Ms Santona, Thank you for answering me. Could you please make sure the French team communicate with me by email? Normal mail takes forever for me to receive now that I live in China and I am not going to wait one month to act if there is an ongoing fraud.

item.title: Reply from Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description: KEY POINT OF THIS EVENT: By acknowledging that McDonald‚Äôs Corporation executives ‚Äútake such inquiries seriously‚Äù, McDonald‚Äôs Corporation can’t claim plausible deniability anymore. Furthermore, the email from Ms. Santona who is the General Counsel of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation is CCed to the CEO of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation Steve Easterbrook. From: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Subject: Re: update Date receivedÔºö2015-10-21 23:47 (Beijing time +0800) To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Cc: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com> Thanks for your follow-up note.

item.title: Email sent to Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, requesting an update
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: update Date sentÔºö2015-10-21 22:45 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Cc: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com> Ms. Santona, I would like to give a friendly reminder that I gave McDonald‚Äôs a deadline of October 22nd 2015 midnight GMT time. So you have about 36 hours left. It was 4 entire days which is more than enough considering I‚Äôve sent my first cease and desist letter back in 2012.

item.title: Fraud of the century: emails to McDonald‚Äôs executives
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Fraud of the century Date sent: October 20, 2015 at 03:13 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Cc: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Robert Gibbs (Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com), Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Kevin Ozan <Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com>, Jim Sappington (Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com), Mike Andres <Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com> Ms. Santona, First of all, I want to thank you for having taken my phone call today without hanging up on me right away. Your counter-part in France, Mme de Borda, always refused to communicate with me through phone.

item.title: ‚ÄúI sold my soul to McDonald‚Äôs‚Äù
item.description: This book contains a crucial evidence that McDonald’s Corporation executives could have easily, through a simple phone call, stop the ongoing frauds which were happening in France. Then, why didn’t they? In addition to the fact that there is an undeniable proof that, contrarily to what Gloria Santona said, this was a French problem, the book offers additional insights about how McDonald’s seems to corrupt politicians.

item.title: Fran√ßoise de Borda, former general counsel of McDonald‚Äôs France
item.description:
Via certified mail with proof of receipt requested

From: Fran√ßoise de Borda (Francoise.deBorda@fr.mcd.com) To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

If I recall correctly, a copy of the mail was sent to a French Ministerial Officer who I now accuse of being corrupted.

Translation coming soon. (Note of 2023-04-13: quick note, this even happened in 2012 and I published it, if I am not mistaken, on 2022-09-21T20:49:00+08:00. Back then I wrote ‚Äútranslation coming soon‚Äù but I currently don’t have time to translate what was said in French. It’s an important event but not that important compared to what I am currently explaining to the FBI which is the priority.)

Fran√ßoise de Borda, directrice juridique de McDonald‚Äôs France, me r√©ponds pour la premi√®re et pour la derni√®re fois. Elle ment.

item.title: McDonald‚Äôs Corporation v. Simon Marketing 2002-09-16
item.description: Around January 2023, I found out that McDonald‚Äôs Corporation sued their supplier under RICO. It’s an important piece of evidence because it proves that when I would keep notifying, in 2015, McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, sternly warning them that they were committing fraud, they could only have immediately understood that the roles were now reversed: McDonald‚Äôs Corporation was now the criminal and they were engaging, via their subsidiary companies, in a pattern of racketeering activity. ‚ÄúMEMORANDUM OPINION AND ORDER
